summary:
Adds a full Kitchen to the Hall of Attainment in the Mage's College
And optional file adds changes to ArchMage Quarters
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff00ff][size=6]Kursan Presents: Mages Kitchen  

                                    [img]http://i.imgur.com/VFlvwAI.png[/img] [/size][/color]

[color=#00ffff][size=3]Description:

At last I got to play a mage and what, no place to cook in the mages college?
No wonder all those mages look so gaunt and starved!

This mod adds a complete kitchen (except the sink) in the upstairs
Hall of Attainment in the Mages College of Winterhold.

I used one of the alcoves that had absolutely useless storage crates in it,
all the usable food barrels that were there got simply moved in the hall or next door.
The Kitchen features many labeled storage barrels and 3 of them respawn because
their contents are hard to find in game, they are: Butter Milk and Chicken eggs all
needed for baking and there is a bread oven in the kitchen.
There is a cooking spit before a large fire place and besides those functional items
a bunch of decorative clutter one might find in a kitchen.

The Mages actually will come by and use the kitchen at random.

On the outside I added a wood chopping block in the yard.[/size][/color]


[color=#cc4125]Now there is an optional version that makes some changes to the ArchMages Quarters!
I felt that those living quarters were really drab and cold feeling; I know there are other mods that improve the ArchMages Quarters, this is my interpretation of a more welcoming and cozier living space, I hope you like it. The additions are not over the top and more aimed at luxury versus the usual "show off my loot" lay out.
1.1 makes the following changes to the ArchMages Quarters:
Adds two fire places, one to cook and one more ornamental one for heat and looks by the bed.
Changes location of bed, necessary for fire place location logistics.
Adds an ornamental tub with steaming water.
Adds several heat sources for comfort and looks.
Adds 9 standing weapon racks, perfect for staffs.
Adds 3 library type Bookcases, one empty plus one more open bookshelf.
Adds many rugs to cover the cold stone floor.
Adds some wall decorations and draping.
Adds one more small display case.
Moved some existing furnishings around to work better with the layout.
Deleted unnecessary clutter, i.e. useless baskets etc.
There are NO mannequins or wall mounted plaques and I will not take requests for any, sorry.
You can find that file here[/color][color=#9900ff]:[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48806/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48806/?[/url]

[color=#ffd966][size=3]Dependencies:
This mod requires Hearthfires dlc because of the bread oven and new ingredients!

Compatability:
This mod should be compatible with other mods that make changes to the college or the Arch-Mage quarters in particular unless they affect the exact same room in the Hall of Attainment, which is a fairly small area.

Credits:
Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim.
Special thanks to Shezrie who's wonderful kitchens have been an inspiration since Morrowind.

Liability:

None, use this mod at your own risk, always save a back up before installing a new mod!
Most game malfunctions are due to interaction of mods not one particular mod. [/size][/color]
author: Kursan
